docs.snippet: Secretary Hull today announced the appointment of Breckinridge Long, former Ambassador to Italy, as head of the commission which will join with other American countries in starting a new steamship line to the East coast of South America, to take the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary Hull today announced the appointment of Breckinridge Long, former Ambassador to Italy, as head of the commission which will join with other American countries in starting a new steamship line to the East coast of South America, to take the place of the former Munson Line.
docs.abstract: Named comm head to start new Munson SS Line service to East coast of South Amer

headline.main: HEADS MUNSON LINE BODY; Breckenridge Long Named on Commission to Set Up New Service

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The American Republics liner Brazil, which will sail Saturday on the first voyage of the new passenger and freight service to the east coast of South America, was taken on a trial run yesterday to Fire Island and Barnegat Light.
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Republics liner Brazil, which will sail Saturday on the first voyage of the new passenger and freight service to the east coast of South America, was taken on a trial run yesterday to Fire Island and Barnegat Light.
docs.abstract: Amer Republics liner Brazil taken on trial run

headline.main: REPUBLICS LINER HAS OCEAN TRIAL; The Brazil Sails Saturday on New Service to East Coast of South America 2 OTHERS NEARLY READY Argentina and Uruguay to Be Tested Soon--W. J. McGough Named Freight Manager

docs.snippet: Efforts to settle the century-old boundary dispute between Peru and Ecuador have broken down so far as the special delegations that have been negotiating here for more than two years are concerned, it was learned today.
docs.lead_paragraph: Efforts to settle the century-old boundary dispute between Peru and Ecuador have broken down so far as the special delegations that have been negotiating here for more than two years are concerned, it was learned today.
docs.abstract: Negotiations with Peru suspended; Roosevelt to have served as arbitrator

headline.main: PERU AND ECUADOR BREAK BORDER TALK; Negotiations in Washington by Two Delegations Are Ended After Two Years Breakdown Before Lima Parley Ecuador Wanted to Continue PERU AND ECUADOR BREAK BORDER TALK Costa Rican Announces Accord

docs.snippet: The export trade of the United States with Europe held up well during August compared with the same month in 1937, the Department of Commerce reported today in an analysis of figures for that month by countries.
docs.lead_paragraph: The export trade of the United States with Europe held up well during August compared with the same month in 1937, the Department of Commerce reported today in an analysis of figures for that month by countries.

headline.main: EXPORTS HOLD UP DESPITE ASIAN DROP; United States in August Sent Out $230,621,000 Goods$277,031,000 in 1937 RUSSIA BUYS STILL MORE Two-Way Trade With Far East Down Most-Decline, Too, for South America Movements by Countries

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: In connection with the launching of the government's new "Good Neighbor" steamship service to South America, the Maritime Commission has approved an agreement among three steamship companies serving West and East Coast ports of the southern...
docs.lead_paragraph: In connection with the launching of the government's new "Good Neighbor" steamship service to South America, the Maritime Commission has approved an agreement among three steamship companies serving West and East Coast ports of the southern continent, covering a round-trip cruise service for passengers who wish to travel down one coast and return along the other.
docs.abstract: inspected by press; Maritime Comm approves agreement on South Amer service among Amer Republics Line, Grace Line and Furness Prince Line
